title: Fragment

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of silk, linen, and gilt-animal-substrate-wrapped linen, weft-faced three-color complementary weft twill weave with inner warps.

medium_display: Silk, linen, and gilt-animal-substrate-wrapped linen, weft-faced three-color complementary weft twill weave with inner warps
credit_line: Gift of Martin A. Ryerson through the Antiquarian Society
